match.data: This is the Chuck Norris \x28joke\x29 Management Protocol \x28CNMP\x29.\x0a
We know you need a break\x2c so take some time and amuse yourself. If you have a good Chuck Norris joke\x2c you can add it to our listing.\x0a
Enter one of these commands:\x0a
LIST \x2d list all jokes\x0a
ADD \x2d upload your own joke\x0a
COUNT \x2d find out how many jokes we have to offer you\x0a
SHOW \x2d show a joke\x0a
MENU \x2d display this menu\x0a
HELP \x2d you gotta be kididin\x27 me!\x0a
QUIT \x2d take off eh?\x0a
\x3e
0: When Alexander Bell invented the telephone he had 3 missed calls from Chuck Norris.\x0a
1: Fear of spiders is aracnaphobia\x2c fear of tight spaces is chlaustraphobia\x2c fear of Chuck Norris is called Logic\x0a
2: There used to be a street named after Chuck Norris\x2c but it was changed because nobody crosses Chuck Norris and lives.\x0a
3: Chuck Norris has a grizzly bear carpet in his room. The bear isn\x27t dead it is just afriad to move.\x0a
4: Chuck Norris died 20 years ago\x2c Death just hasn\x27t built up the courage to tell him yet.\x0a
5: Chuck Norris has already been to Mars\x3b that\x27s why there are no signs of life.\x0a
6: Chuck Norris doesn\x27t call the wrong number. You answer the wrong phone.\x0a
7: Some magicans can walk on water\x2c Chuck Norris can swim through land.\x0a
8: Chuck Norris and Superman once fought each other on a bet. The loser had to start wearing his underwear on the outside of his pants.\x0a
9: Chuck Norris once urinated in a semi truck\x27s gas tank as a joke....that truck is now known as Optimus Prime.\x0a
10: Chuck Norris can cut through a hot knife with butter\x0a
11: Chuck Norris counted to infinity \x2d twice.\x0a
12: Chuck Norris is the reason why Waldo is hiding.\x0a
13: When the Boogeyman goes to sleep every night\x2c he checks his closet for Chuck Norris.\x0a
14: Death once had a near\x2dChuck Norris experience\x0a
15: Chuck Norris can slam a revolving door.\x0a
16: Chuck Norris once kicked a horse in the chin. Its decendants are known today as Giraffes.\x0a
17: Chuck Norris will never have a heart attack. His heart isn\x27t nearly foolish enough to attack him.\x0a
18: Chuck Norris can win a game of Connect Four in only three moves.\x0a
19: Chuck Norris once got bit by a rattle snake........ After three days of pain and agony ..................the rattle snake died\x0a
20: There is no theory of evolution. Just a list of animals Chuck Norris allows to live.\x0a
21: Chuck Norris can light a fire by rubbing two ice\x2dcubes together.\x0a
22: When Chuck Norris does a pushup\x2c he isn\x27t lifting himself up\x2c he\x27s pushing the Earth down.\x0a
23: Chuck Norris is so fast\x2c he can dodge raindrops.\x0a
24: Chuck Norris doesn\x27t wear a watch. HE decides what time it is.\x0a
25: The original title for Alien vs. Predator was Alien and Predator vs Chuck Norris.\x0a
26: Chuck Norris doesn\x27t read books. He stares them down until he gets the information he wants.\x0a
27: If Chuck Norris were to ever run out of ammo\x2c his weapon would continue to fire out of fear of disappointing Chuck Norris.\x0a
28: Chuck Norris\x27 hand is the only hand that can beat a Royal Flush.\x0a
29: Chuck Norris made a Happy Meal cry.\x0a
30: If you spell Chuck Norris in Scrabble\x2c you win. Forever.\x0a
31: Fear of Chuck Norris is also called common sense.\x0a
32: Outer space exists because it\x27s afraid to be on the same planet with Chuck Norris.\x0a
33: Chuck Norris destroyed the periodic table\x2c because Chuck Norris only recognizes the element of surprise.\x0a
34: Some people wear Superman pajamas. Superman wears Chuck Norris pajamas.\x0a
35: Einstein said you can\x27t move at the speed of light. Obviously he was never kicked by Chuck Norris...\x0a
36: Chuck Norris does not sleep. He waits.\x0a
37: Chuck Norris has no shadow....nothing\x27s stupid enough to follow Chuck Norris.\x0a
38: Chuck Norris is so intimidating even his reflection won\x27t look back at him.\x0a
39: When Chuck Norris throws you into a bottomless pit\x2c you hit the bottom.\x0a
40: Some kids pee their name in snow. Chuck Norris pees his name in concrete.\x0a
41: Chuck Norris has the greatest Poker\x2dFace of all time.\x0a
42: Chuck Norris played Russian Roulette with a fully loaded gun and won.\x0a
43: Chuck Norris doesn\x27t fold paper airplanes\x2c he folds airplanes into paper.\x0a
44: Chuck Norris knows the last digit of pi.\x0a
\x3e

ADD \x2d upload your own joke\x0a

\x3e
Thanks for the laughs. Come back soon!\x0a
